events.name: activate
events.text: Fires whenever item within the Container is activated.

items.name: newActiveItem
items.text: The new active item within the container.

items.name: oldActiveItem
items.text: The old active item within the container.

events.name: activeItemchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!activeItem}` changes.

events.name: add
events.text: Fires whenever item added to the Container.

items.name: item
items.text: The item added to the Container.

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item within the Container.

events.name: added
events.text: Fires after a Component had been added to a Container.

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item within the Container.

events.name: beforeactiveItemchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!activeItem}` changes.

events.name: beforebottomchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!bottom}` changes.

events.name: beforecenteredchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!centered}` changes.

events.name: beforedisabledchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!disabled}` changes.

events.name: beforedockedchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!docked}` changes.

events.name: beforeheightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!height}` changes.

events.name: beforehiddenchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!hidden}` changes.

events.name: beforehide
events.text: Fires before the Component is hidden. Hide may be vetoed by returning `false` from a handler.

events.name: beforeleftchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!left}` changes.

events.name: beforemaxHeightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!maxHeight}` changes.

events.name: beforemaxWidthchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!maxWidth}` changes.

events.name: beforeminHeightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!minHeight}` changes.

events.name: beforeminWidthchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!minWidth}` changes.

events.name: beforeorientationchange
events.text: Fires before orientation changes.

events.name: beforerefresh
events.text:
Fires before a refresh to the chart data is called.  If the `{@link #event!beforerefresh beforerefresh}`
handler returns `false` the {@link #event!refresh #refresh} action will be canceled.

events.name: beforerightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!right}` changes.

events.name: beforescrollablechange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!scrollable}` changes.

events.name: beforeshow
events.text: Fires before the Component is shown. Show may be vetoed by returning `false` from a handler.

events.name: beforetofront
events.text: Fires before a {@link #cfg!floated #cfg-floated} component is brought to the front of the visual stack.

events.name: beforetopchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!top}` changes.

events.name: beforewidthchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!width}` changes.

events.name: blur
events.text: Fires when this Component's {@link #property!focusEl #focusEl} loses focus.

events.name: bodyresize
events.text: Fires when the size of the draw container body changes.

items.name: size
items.text: The object containing 'width' and 'height' of the draw container's body.

events.name: bottomchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!bottom}` changes.

events.name: centeredchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!centered}` changes.

events.name: deactivate
events.text: Fires whenever item within the Container is deactivated.

items.name: oldActiveItem
items.text: The old active item within the container.

items.name: newActiveItem
items.text: The new active item within the container.

events.name: destroy
events.text: Fires when the component is destroyed

events.name: disabledchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!disabled}` changes.

events.name: dockedchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!docked}` changes.

events.name: erased
events.text:
Fires when the component is no longer displayed in the DOM.  Listening to this event will
degrade performance not recommend for general use.

events.name: floatingchange
events.text: Fires whenever there is a change in the positioned status of a component

items.name: positioned
items.text:
The component's new positioned state. This becomes
`true` is a component is positioned using the {@link #cfg!top #cfg-top}, {@link #cfg!right #cfg-right},
{@link #cfg!bottom #cfg-bottom} or {@link #cfg!left #cfg-left} configs.

events.name: focus
events.text: Fires when this Component's {@link #property!focusEl #focusEl} receives focus.

events.name: focusenter
events.text: Fires when focus enters this Component's hierarchy.

events.name: focusleave
events.text: Fires when focus leaves this Component's hierarchy.

events.name: fullscreen
events.text: Fires whenever a Component with the fullscreen config is instantiated

events.name: heightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!height}` changes.

events.name: hiddenchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!hidden}` changes.

events.name: hide
events.text: Fires whenever the Component is hidden

events.name: initialize
events.text: Fires when the component has been initialized

events.name: itemclick
itemdblclick
itemhighlight
events.text: Fires when an item is highlighted.

events.name: itemhighlightchange
events.text: Fires when an item's highlight changes.

events.name: itemmousedown
itemmousemove
itemmouseout
itemmouseover
itemmouseup
itemtap
layout
events.text:
Fires after the final layout is done.
(Two layouts may be required to fully render a chart.
Typically for the initial render and every time thickness
of the chart's axes changes.)

events.name: leftchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!left}` changes.

events.name: maxHeightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!maxHeight}` changes.

events.name: maxWidthchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!maxWidth}` changes.

events.name: minHeightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!minHeight}` changes.

events.name: minWidthchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!minWidth}` changes.

events.name: move
events.text: Fires whenever item moved within the Container.

items.name: item
items.text: The item moved within the Container.

items.name: toIndex
items.text: The new index of the item.

items.name: fromIndex
items.text: The old index of the item.

events.name: moved
events.text: Fires when a component si moved within its Container.

items.name: toIndex
items.text: The new index of the item.

items.name: fromIndex
items.text: The old index of the item.

events.name: orientationchange
events.text: Fires when orientation changes.

events.name: painted
events.text:
Fires whenever this Element actually becomes visible (painted) on the screen. This is
useful when you need to perform 'read' operations on the DOM element, i.e: calculating
natural sizes and positioning.

__Note:__ This event is not available to be used with event delegation. Instead `{@link #event!painted painted}`
only fires if you explicitly add at least one listener to it, for performance reasons.

events.name: positionedchange
events.text: Fires whenever there is a change in the positioned status of a component

items.name: positioned
items.text:
The component's new positioned state. This becomes
`true` is a component is positioned using the {@link #cfg!top #cfg-top}, {@link #cfg!right #cfg-right},
{@link #cfg!bottom #cfg-bottom} or {@link #cfg!left #cfg-left} configs.

events.name: redraw
events.text: Fires after each {@link #event!redraw} call.

events.name: refresh
events.text: Fires after the chart data has been refreshed.

events.name: remove
events.text: Fires whenever item removed from the Container.

items.name: item
items.text: The item removed from the Container.

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item that was removed.

events.name: removed
events.text: Fires when a component is removed from a Container

items.name: index
items.text: The index of the item that was removed.

events.name: renderedchange
events.text:
Fires whenever an item is rendered into a container or derendered
from a Container.

items.name: rendered
items.text: The current rendered status of the item.

events.name: resize
events.text:
Important note: For the best performance on mobile devices, use this only when you
absolutely need to monitor a Element's size.

__Note:__ This event is not available to be used with event delegation. Instead `{@link #event!resize resize}`
only fires if you explicitly add at least one listener to it, for performance reasons.

events.name: rightchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!right}` changes.

events.name: scrollablechange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!scrollable}` changes.

events.name: show
events.text: Fires whenever the Component is shown

events.name: spriteclick
events.text: Fires when a click event occurs on a sprite.

events.name: spritedblclick
events.text: Fires when a double click event occurs on a sprite.

events.name: spritemousedown
events.text: Fires when a mousedown event occurs on a sprite.

events.name: spritemousemove
events.text: Fires when the mouse is moved on a sprite.

events.name: spritemouseout
events.text: Fires when the mouse exits a sprite.

events.name: spritemouseover
events.text: Fires when the mouse enters a sprite.

events.name: spritemouseup
events.text: Fires when a mouseup event occurs on a sprite.

events.name: spritetap
events.text: Fires when a tap event occurs on a sprite.

events.name: storechange
events.text: Fires when the store of the chart changes.

events.name: tofront
events.text:
Fires when a {@link #cfg!floated #cfg-floated} component has been brought to the front of the visual
stack.

events.name: topchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!top}` changes.

events.name: updatedata
events.text: Fires whenever the data of the component is updated

events.name: widthchange
events.text: This event fires when `{@link #cfg!width}` changes.
